Header: MP Ramanayake allegedly threatened at Divulapitiya Development Committee Meeting
Content: The Divulapitiya Development Committee Meeting was held on February 28 at the Divisional Secretariat. A tense situation erupted at the meeting when Deputy Minister Ranjan Ramanayake questioned officials on land excavations in the area. The situation escalated with the intervention of parliamentarian Indika Anuruddha.
